website_summaries.verdict: Food grade copper with brass handles that are well made and look nice.
pros: Thumb rest on the top of brass handles makes them easy to use and comfortable to hold
Set of 2 for a decent price that can make a nice gift
Mugs are lined with FDA-approved food-safe lacquer
cons: Not as heavy gauge as some others available

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and gorgeous product!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing my mug sets. I don't believe in "disposable purchases". I could not have been more pleased with my selection! The handles are large enough to feel comfortable and substantial, and the little thumb resting spot is a detail that adds a bit of extra panache. The overall quality of these is just so fantastic....the weight and balance is perfect. I'm really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Yorkshire

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE with these mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these mugs in the mail and wow. They are gorgeous! The copper is so shiny and stayed shiny after washing it when my other mugs got stained after. Much better quality than the $100 set I saw at a store and an amazing price. My husband was also impressed with how great his drink tasted! He was shocked I made it myself. I'll be getting these as gifts for my friends for the holidays and as house warming gifts. HIGHLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as described - love it when that happens! Only washed (by hand) a couple of times, but they look like they will last. Comfortable to hold. Beautiful to look at. Glad I chose these. Also want to add how attentive Avran Ltd. followed up my purchase with an email letting me know how to contact them and sending recipes when I received my mugs. Good customer marketing on their part. I would not hesitate to buy from them at some other time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth9600

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mugs, better quality than a set my wife bought at a high end store
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super great! I have had ginger beer, water and orange juice in them so far and always cool and refreshing (even the bottled water I pour in there at room temp!)
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Primrose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, You'll Love It
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mugs! High quality, beautiful craftsmanship. Solid copper inside/out. Love the handle. Thumb rest comfortable 2 hold, brass ensures handle doesn't get too cold 2 touch (mug itself gets really cold due 2 pure copper). Bought a set for me, more for others. So glad I did. Great value. Very highly recommended 4 anyone who wants great looking mug to keep cold drinks cold, hot drinks hot.
customer_reviews.author: mrkm

customer_reviews.title: Fully Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, shiny mugs - and after first use I can say thumbs up, and still look good after washing/drying! Bought two sets and glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Novotny

customer_reviews.title: These are not Copper Mugs! You're buying from liars!
customer_reviews.text: This is strait up BS! This is not 100% copper! Look at the photo of the indents(as it came to me) Your product is not as advertised, and this mug is copper coated, not pure copper. I hope the next time anyone who advertised this product, had to go to a doctor, they end up at a witch-doctor or holistic medical expert. Crooks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with our new mugs! Enjoyed a few Mules on Monday!!
customer_reviews.author: MKnute

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - Great packaging and Great Service. I am actually buying more today for my neighbor!
customer_reviews.author: Kathrene Peters

customer_reviews.title: Best copper mug, read to find out why
customer_reviews.text: Is what it looks like, a copper mug (x2). Works well, holds a lot, somehow makes my Moscow Mule (or Mediterranean Mule, look it up!) seem to taste even better. There are many others in this price range, but I got these because of the thumb rest. Now that I've used them, I'm glad I did. The thumb rest is clutch! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! They keep your drink cool, and there is no weird copper taste like I have experienced from cheap mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E. Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: Love the thumb rest
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. LOVE the thumb rest. That's what sets it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these mugs thinking they were going to be amazing and perfect for my moscow mules! Sadly, I was wrong. They arrived in an undamaged box and were carefully wrapped in tissue paper but they are scratched up and not presentable at all! Also, the handle is detaching and wiggling. I haven't even gotten to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Kel_hin

customer_reviews.title: Good prioduct
customer_reviews.text: Great cups at good price. They were a gift and they use them several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lrover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship. Keeps my drinks cool - I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship. Keeps my drinks cool - I use it for almost every drink I make - not only the Moscow mule. Can't believe I didn't have one until now - it has changed my drinking expiriance forever. Cheers. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mule mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully well made mugs, great for experimenting with a variety of mule recipes. They are copper inside and out. The handle feels good in your hand and is more attractive then the angular handles found on most copper mugs.
customer_reviews.author: K. M Miele

customer_reviews.title: Love my KoolBrew copper moscow mules!
customer_reviews.text: Kool Brew copper moscow mule mugs are so on trend. They're fabulous. The shiny, hammered design is awesome. I love the packaging. They're great for gift giving - attractive packaging. Plus, you get great recipes. So easy and convenient to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were the favorite since they have the thumb rest
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of different types of these mugs. These were the favorite since they have the thumb rest.....
customer_reviews.author: Honi and Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, solid feeling copper mugs
customer_reviews.text: I like these copper mugs. They are priced very well. Arrive in nice packaging and when you take them out of the box and remove the wrap you can see the mugs are of very good quality. The brass handle is sized perfectly and these mugs look sharp. For serving up the Moscow Mule's these mugs are perfect. Thank you, KoolBrew.
customer_reviews.author: Dean S Zehner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mugs! Drinks stay cold forever....thumb rest is really convenient too....I recommend these to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend these KoolBrew mugs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mugs! Really keep my drinks cold, and are beautiful to look at. The thumb rest is a nice touch as well. I was planning on just getting one set, but will probably get more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Aryeh M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mugs that completely surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mugs that completely surpassed expectations. They look great, feel great, and have a perfect weight in your hands. Beyond just the mugs, the customers service was the best I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my husband wanted, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes his Moscow Mules and uses these almost every day. They are excellent quality and keep your drink ice cold. But don't put them in the dishwasher, they will lose their shine after just one run. Wash by hand, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Chips and scratches
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these were a return or just bad craftsmanship. Handles were chipped and one cup had More than a few chips on the inside. Both rims of the cups were very scratched and discolored. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: kjsk71

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and she is thrilled. Good quality/workmanship. Attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Callan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mugs. Keeps drinks nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mugs. Keeps drinks nice and cold. Love the thumb knobs on them.
customer_reviews.author: DRiley

customer_reviews.title: We loved the cups
customer_reviews.text: We loved the cups! They looked just like the package when we opened them. They keep our drinks cool. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Arno

customer_reviews.title: The thumb rest is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. I did have to send the first set back because of a little corrosion on the lip of one of the mugs, but the replacements were perfect. I hand wash them ... but the Moscow Mules are so refreshing served in them. I can't wait for the hot summer nights, sipping the drinks on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Brechie

customer_reviews.title: Great mule mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Especially like the thumb rest, a nice feature that many mule mugs don't have.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: These came in today. I was supposed to give them as a gift tomorrow. They are rusted and dirty it looks like someone used them for a year and returned them. So disappointing. They also don’t look rose gold they look like they are just gold.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer659

customer_reviews.title: Black marks and looked used
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. First set come in broken box and out of packaging. Covered in tarnished black marks. Amazon customer service great and sent a replacement. Unfortunately the replacement was also tarnished and in bad shape. Disappointed because liked the look otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, Affordable and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and authentic! I'm impressed. Received these mugs in time for the holidays and were delivered earlier than expected and for less cost than most of the others out there. I definitely made the right purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Place for thumb is the best mug feature ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these mugs! We've been looking for a decent set at a decent price and these met our needs and expectations! The design of the thumb rest for the top of the handle is something I didn't even know I needed until I was at a friends house using their copper mugs that had a "fancy" pointed top handle that stabbed into my thumb every time I picked up the mug.
customer_reviews.author: Erin O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Soooo much better tasting!
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered these mugs per a suggestion from one of our local delicatessen/meat stores. He asked if we had ever tried the Moscow Mule from a copper mug, if not I need to try it. Man was he right. It's fresher tasting and since it keeps it ice cold I just enjoyed my drink out of it much better. It's a must try if you've never had a drink in one.
customer_reviews.author: douglas l perkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for arrived on time and has gotten a fair amount of use already
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice mugs, pretty, but wife couldn't hold it with hot coffee in it as the handle conducts heat so well she nearly dropped the mug so I guess we will use them for cold mule drinks in summer and hope not to get frostbite.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G Burton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Moscow Mules!
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs for our Moscow Mules, they are beautiful! They truly make the drink taste better than out of a glass! These are high quality look and feel just like the ones we paid far more for from the specialty store.
customer_reviews.author: CBClark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs, great price, I have used them a lot already
customer_reviews.author: Christy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the mugs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to hold, when making drinks with ice the cups get really cold and condensation forms, the handles also get cold, the beauty of the craftsmanship makes them something that I would buy again, love them
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m always amazed at how cold these are when I make a drink! I wish the handle was a little bigger, but no biggie. For me, the thumb part at the top is useless because I have to put my thumb on the cup to stabilize the cup while drinking, due to the cup being so large and the handle being so thin/narrow. So there are a few design flaws, but overall it does its job and they are nice looking cups.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mugs but arrived with a dent. Decided to keep instead of dealing with a return. I HIGHLY recommend getting pure copper mugs instead of the stainless interiors. The stainless really taints the flavor Update 12/5/18 I had some contact with the company I purchased these from and the promptly replaced them. I'm glad to report the new mugs are dent free.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Metallic taste from the rim of the mug
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing mug, great benefits too. However, I happen to get a strong metallic taste in my mouth when I drink from it which seems to be coming from the rim of the mug. It doesn’t seem to be solid copper, more copper plated (haven’t read to see if that’s in the description).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: One of the two mugs has a hole in the side..the working one is nice.
customer_reviews.text: So far the one that doesn’t leak works great! I gave these cups to my wife for Christmas, and when she tried using one to make a drink, it has a pinhole Leak on the side of it. I’m not sure how to contact the seller to see if they can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: skrage99

customer_reviews.title: great mugs, great price
customer_reviews.text: These mugs keep drinks cold and the water seems to taste better. My doctor recommended a 100% copper mug for me to put by my bedside to help with stomach issues. I like the size, the grip, and the fact that they are not heavy like my copper cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Hass

customer_reviews.title: Handles a little thin for me...
customer_reviews.text: I like those a lot. They are pretty and perfect for my mules but I think the hand grips are a little thin. Kind of awkward to pick up. You really need 2 hands to hold it tonrrally feel like you have a comfortable grip. But they are good!
customer_reviews.author: Joyfulgin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my Mule Mugs. Thank you for your assistance. Responsible company.
customer_reviews.author: Melva

customer_reviews.title: Check the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't know think I trashed them due to the demonic price. Triple nine bad upside down very bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Design.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Moscow mule mugs. Excellent quality and design. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.W. Lewin

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love the thumb-tab.
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift. Very nice quality. When I used one, especially liked the thumb-tab on handle. Really, really makes it so much nicer than others I've used in restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: abelha727

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: The first set I received had what appeared to be super glue or something stuck to the side of the mug. I received my new set before sending my the originals back which was nice. The second set I received, had what looked like scratches on the bottom inside of one of the mugs. I did not send back for another replacement. Seems ok but I would have bought a cheaper set of copper mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggles

customer_reviews.title: Great size, feels good in your hand with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size, feels good in your hand with the thumb grip. Beautifully done with the hammered Cooper. Keeps the drinks chilled and tasting better. All that I asked for
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Nice n light sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully doing what I bought for makes water taste good and bought for inflammation light to hold really nice gave one dad one for me
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: scratches
customer_reviews.text: Scratches easily and a bit difficult to maintain looking good. More of an issue with copper cups in general I think. These seems to be built well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Marcum

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE COPPER CUPS! THEY REALLY KEEP DRINKS COLD and the thumb rests are quite nice (so your fingers don't get cold holding the cold cups. WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: COREENEE

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for someone last Christmas and have purchased more since then as gifts and for myself. These mugs are easy to hold, perfect gifts and are great quality. To anyone who loves Moscow mules, Kentucky mules or Mexican mules I highly recommend these mugs. The quality is great and they make gifts to anyone who loves cocktails!
customer_reviews.author: Gstall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my husband. The copper really does make a difference in how the coldness is perceived. Very refreshing for homemade mules!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor D.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality, terrible ergonomics, uncomfortable to hold. Appears copper plated only and very thin layered at that.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with scratches and the flat part of the thumb rest already had the copper rubbed off and was black. The thumb rests are also incredibly uncomfortable. I'm a guy with fairly large hands and even I found it awkward to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Customer-TK108

customer_reviews.title: They are light and I love the handle
customer_reviews.text: We are using them for not only Moscow Mules, but for other drinks that are tasty in an icy cold mug. They are light and I love the handle. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! They have a large gap between the cup and handle which is going to be perfect for my dad since these were part of his Father’s Day gift. Couldn’t ask for a better price point either.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs&MrMichael

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold, but one mug was noticeably dented.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product when constructed well. Unfortunately, 1 of the 2 mugs I received had a noticeable dent in the side. Additionally, the opening of that same mug was not even or circular, almost as if the mug had been warped to a small degree. This product does keep your drink very cold, but the design with one of the mugs was noticebably different than the other, and therefore would leave me hard to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I luv my Copper cups. My drinks stay exceptionally cold longer. I am using them with other everyday drinks. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Berdina F Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: One had a little chip, scratch on the handle but acceptable. I am keeping them rather than go through a return, virus keeping me inside.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are not 100% copper mugs. At least the ones I received aren’t. They are copper plated and I couldn’t be more disappointed these were a gift and now I’m going to have to find a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooper Mule Mugs: Quality addition to the home bar
customer_reviews.text: These mule mugs are fantastic! Great dimensions with regard to handle and thumb rest. Hammered copper is a cool aesthetic. Also customer service "presses the care button" with a follow up email to ensure care instructions (which were also included with the mugs) are clear. Price was also reasonable!! With bars not currently open in our area, it's nice to mix things up a little with drinks at home.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered Moscow mule drinks and wanted to get the correct cups in which to make them. I love how cold they keep my beverage and they are easy to hold with the little thumbrest on each handle.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice cups, light weight but the only thing I could say wrong about them is the handle on them is really thin, can’t seem to get a good grip. But I would order them again, they are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: teamroper

customer_reviews.title: These were not great quality
customer_reviews.text: One mug was dented at the bottom and the inside is changing color. I wash it with warm soapy water and dry right away. Very disappointed. Was wanting another set but I will buy from someone else
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are very nice quality. The handles are a simple design and easy to hold. Would make a very nice gift or for adding to your beverage ware collection.
customer_reviews.author: Deb_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, packaging beat up and falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: The actual mugs are great, they look and feel awesome! But the box it came in (not the Amazon box, the Koolbrew mug box that was in the Amazon box) is really beat up, falling apart, and looks bad. The only reason this bothers me is because this was a gift and it just looks bad. But the product itself is good, I just think the handling was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mules
customer_reviews.text: These cups are awesome! I have spent a lot of $ on mule cups from pier one and these cups were cheaper and exactly the same! Hand wash only
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited for these. Umm I think I got a used and returned pair. Has a huge dent on the side. The handle looks old and the inside of the mugs are scratched. Black marks. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MsTenC

customer_reviews.title: Love♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: I like the space for your thumb and I like the way it's shaped it gives me the feel of the old-time mugs sitting around a campfire I love it. Makes the water tastes nice and minerally just like mountain fresh water
customer_reviews.author: Lisa walsh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful supplier
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful directions and suggestions regarding the care of the mugs. Great supplier. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good Job
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. We drank out of the cups. They worked like cups.
customer_reviews.author: Remo Enea

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mule. Hold more than you would think. My husband loved them. But they do sweat bad!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Triana White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great and really keep the drinks cold. Very nice company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Goeppner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband on our 7th wedding anniversary, and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The best copper cups for a Moscow mule drink
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted. Drinks stay icy cold for a long time. Good for hot and cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sikora

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are so nice! Just perfect on a cold winter night with ...
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are so nice ! Just perfect on a cold winter night with hot chocolate and great with drinks in the summer! I really love their look so I decided to keep my table set with them ! copper is also a very healthy to drink with I understand !
customer_reviews.author: Ton Ton

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome mugs - keeps miles frosty cold and a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Needed New Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy....
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying these mugs. The thickness of these mugs are so thin my ice melted before I got to my second sip. The thickness of a red Solo cup is thicker then these mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These copper cups are perfect. They are restaurant quality and arguably better. Made my first Moscow Mules last night and my guest was impressed with the look and feel of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: you can tell by the soldering points these are going to fall apart quick
customer_reviews.author: rdnskrs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, quality and craftsmanship are great.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Mallea

customer_reviews.title: durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: When I got these I was worried that the handles would inevitably break away, but after using them for a while now they still hold up very well. they look great and serve their purpose. I am very happy with these :)
customer_reviews.author: donovin mays

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. SUPER cold, the little spot to put your thumb is such a nice feature you didn't even know you needed!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Cups are not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The handle is thin and cheap. Item not as pictured. Very disappointed. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: celiac1

customer_reviews.title: All copper
customer_reviews.text: NIce weight and all copper. Kept my drink cold. cute design
customer_reviews.author: Venessa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very giftable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a mule kick for awhile and these are great!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: You’re Moscow mule will taste better in these mugs :)
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Often nicer then the ones I’m served in at the restaurants. Very happy with my mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: She loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister she says give them a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: donkeydon

customer_reviews.title: 7th year anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mugs - perfect for our 7th year anniversary as copper/wool is the traditional gift. We've enjoyed our drinks in these mugs for the past week, so too early to tell if they will continue to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M Z

customer_reviews.title: Everything you expect
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as expected and quickly. Works how I would expect,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Quality mugs at a good price. Keeps drink very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking mugs AND they fit your hand perfectly! The thumb rest is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and they went great with the coasters I got to go with them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding  Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these mugs late Friday afternoon and they arrvived by noon on Sunday. Outstanding fast and prompt delivery on this item. The mugs are very sturdy and look fantastic. The quality on the mugs exceeded my expectations. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just received mugs, they came when promised and are just like the ones used in bars for the Moscow Mules. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: jwb147

customer_reviews.title: Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship is very good.Only thing that I would like to see in future product is that the copper material could be thicker. That would give the mug a better feel. Otherwise these are the nicest ones that I have found for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY L.

product_meta.title: KoolBrew Moscow Mule Copper Mugs - Gift Set of 2, 100% Solid Handcrafted Copper Cups - 16 Ounce Food Safe Hammered Mug For Mules
feature_bullets: INDULGE IN PREMIUM QUALITY - This Moscow Mule gift set of 2 authentic Moscow Mule Mugs is handmade by craftsmen who pay attention to every detail. They are made from 100% pure food-safe copper inside and out, that artisans have hammered into an elegant finish. You know you are getting a genuine handcrafted KoolBrew copper mug, because the bottom of each copper mule mug is engraved with the KoolBrew seal of quality.

GIVE THE PERFECT GIFT - This set of 2 16-oz. Moscow Mule Copper Mugs comes in an elegant gift box, ready to send to that special someone. It is the perfect Moscow Mule Mug gift set for His and Hers, best friend, college student, young single, Valentine's Day, wedding, anniversary, business associate, or anyone who enjoys a fun and festive atmosphere.

AN ESSENTIAL COPPER CUP SET - The Koolbrew moscow mule copper mugs are an esseential addition to your kitchen or dining room. Boost the appearance and stun your guests with our authentic hand crafter copper cups for drinks, cocktails and moscow mules!

LUXURY MOSCOW MULE MUG SET - We pride ourselves in the quality craftsmanship of our copper mug sets. Wow your guests, friends, and family with our luxury pair of copper mugs for drinking, cocktails, mules, and more! The hammered shape of our cups and handle make our mugs distinctly different and provide a luxury drinking experience.

GET A SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Buy with confidence, knowing that your satisfaction is our top priority. We are so confident in the quality of our copper mules, that we will refund your money or replace your pure 100% Copper Moscow Mule Mugs at any time if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase.
